凥字的基本解释

凥
jū
古同“居”。

凥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jū］
［《廣韻》九魚切，平魚，見。］
“凥1”的今字。
(1)踞坐；坐。
(2)居住。
(3)住所，住宅。
(4)指坟墓。
(5)处在，处于。
(6)相处。
(7)平素家居。
(8)特指赋闲未仕。
(9)停息。
(10)积储。
(11)指存，存心。
(12)犹经过。表示相隔若干时间。
(13)犹安定，安居。
(14)指生者。
(15)治理；处理。
(16)部署；安排。
(17)谓安放。
(18)明显；明晰。
(19)占，相当。
(20)院、堂、楼、室等常名以“居”。
(21)姓。汉有居股。见《汉书·景武昭宣元成功臣表》。
[②]［jī］
［《廣韻》居之切，平之，見。］
语助词。
[③]［jù］
［《集韻》居御切，去御，見。］
(1)通“倨”。傲慢。
(2)通“鋸”。参见“居3牙”、“居3屬”。
[④]［jǔ］
通“舉1”。

凥字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【几字部】　凥； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页134第04
【集韻】【正韻】?斤於切，音居。【說文】處也。从尸，得几而止也。【玉篇】與居同。【晉書·胡母謙傳】凥背東壁。【正韻】古居字。凥从几案之几，與尻字不同。

凥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
凥字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sway
jū
Gu Tong "home".
Sway
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jū］
["Guangyun" Nine fish cut, flat fish, see. ]
The modern word for "凥1".
(1) Sit down; sit down.
(2) Residence.
(3) Residence, residence.
(4) Refers to the tomb.
(5) Being, being.
(6) Get along.
(7) Normal home furnishing.
(8) In particular, it refers to the unemployed but not official.
(9) Stop interest.
(10) Accumulation.
(11) Refers to save, deliberately.
(12) Still passing by. Means a certain amount of time apart.
(13) Still stable and settled.
(14) Refers to the living.
(15) Governance; treatment.
(16) Deployment; arrangement.
(17) Means placement.
(18) Obvious; clear.
(19) Accounted for, quite.
(20) The common names of courtyards, halls, buildings and rooms are "ju".
(21) Last name. Han Youju shares. See "Book of Han·Jing Wuzhao Xuan Yuan Success Minister Table".
[②]［jī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat, see. ]
Auxiliary words.
[③]［jù］
["Jiyun" stays in Yu cut, goes to Yu, see. ]
(1) Through "wonderful". arrogant.
(2) Through "saw". See "House 3 teeth", "House 3 genera".
[④]［jǔ］
Pass "Cite 1".

[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Jin Yuqie, sound home. 【Said the text】Chu also. From the corpse, it is only a few. [Jade articles] Same with Ju. [Book of Jin·Biography of Hu Muqian] Wong's back on the east wall. [Positive rhyme] ancient home characters. There are several cases of Yong Cong, which is different from the character of Ji.
